participant_1.background:
I'm a family man from the midwest with a passion for theatre.
my mom is a cancer survivor.
My family and I work hard on our farm.
I love listening to the Beatles while I work on my dog's training.
i enjoy electronic music.

participant_2.background:
I keep my surroundings clean and read to keep my mind sharp.
I want to use my skills to help people in need.
I'm going to re-read Anne of Green Gables, but I won't be sharing it with my mom.
I would chew my food slowly as a kid and my dad would always tell me to hurry up.
I have always enjoyed the company of animals in fantasy fiction books, but I do not have any pets of my own.

content.text: Hello! I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I am a family man from the Midwest with a passion for theater.  What about you? What is your passion?
I'm a bookworm who loves to keep their surroundings clean and read to keep my mind sharp.   I am a kind person who wants to use my skills to help people in need.
That's awesome!  I love to read as well.  What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Anne of Green Gables series by L.M. Montgomery.  I'm going to re-read it soon, but I won't be sharing it with my mom!
I love that series too!  I've read it many times.  What do you like about it so much?
I love the characters and the story.  It's so heartwarming and inspiring.
I agree!  It's a great story.  Do you have any pets?
I don't have any pets of my own, but I have always enjoyed the company of animals in fantasy fiction books.
I love animals too!  I have a dog and a cat.  They are my best friends.
That's awesome!  I'm sure they bring you lots of joy.
They sure do!  I love spending time with them.
I'm glad you have such great companions.
Well, it was nice chatting with you!  Have a great day!
